channel.title: BigQuery - Row Level Security
channel.description:
We installed a docker image with redash 8.0.0 and we need to change the file which is mentioned in this ticket: http://discuss.redash.io/t/bigquery-row-level-security/9123, but, We haven't found it.
May you help me ? Because we must activate row level security in BigQuery and make queries in redash, so its necessary to update the file with the solution.
Thank you
